turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order two small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one I want half pepperoni half supreme, and the other one I want half chicken barbecue and the other half green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want both of them to have thick crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i got that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i read back your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, thick crust, 1 half pepperoni, half supreme, 1 half bbq chicken, half green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe you got it right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, did you get with both thick crust? I don't If you said that I apologize.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, i have both with thick crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, great. Sounds like you got it then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the cost will be $30.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: gracious. All right. Those are expensive little pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I'll look for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You have been a big help. And I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.
